name: Ginger Krinkle Cookies
description: Swapped by Chris Crowley at the SE Cookie Swap. Adapted from an old compilation of fundraiser recipes (so they're good for your soul).

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.

Mix together first 3 ingredients. Add sifted flour with cinnamon, ginger, salt and baking soda. Add remaining ingredients. Roll into walnut sized balls and then roll in sugar. Lightly forkpress the cookies 2 ways before baking them.
Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Do not over bake.
